definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to a grouping of languages (formerly proposed to be a language family , now generally considered a sprachbund by linguists) that includes the Turkic languages (e.g. Turkish ), the Mongolic (e.g. Mongolian ) and Tungusic (e.g. Xibe ) languages, and less often the Japonic and Koreanic languages.

main_definition: Of or pertaining to a grouping of languages (formerly proposed to be a language family , now generally considered a sprachbund by linguists) that includes the Turkic languages (e.g. Turkish ), the Mongolic (e.g. Mongolian ) and Tungusic (e.g. Xibe ) languages, and less often the Japonic and Koreanic languages.
